title: Anthony Casalena
description: Anthony Casalena is the Founder and CEO of Squarespace, which launched in 2004.

title: Nicole AnaSenes
description: Nicole brings 20 years of technology industry experience to Squarespace’s Finance Team, and has spent much of her career building new or transforming existing businesses.

title: Andrew Bartholomew
description: As the leader of Squarespace's Strategy division, Andrew is responsible for developing the analytical frameworks that shape the company’s business.
